title: Start
body:
<<You>> 
*Escaping into the woods you run as fast as you can*
*This is until you run into a large figure, and fall over*
<<emotion sad>> 
<<tina>> 
Oh my God Are You Okay?
<< You>>
[[ Yeah… I’m okay |A]]
[[ Uhhh, is this real? |B]]
[[ GET AWAY FROM ME YOU MONSTER |C]]

title: A
body:
You had me worrying for a second!
<<addmeter 20>> 
[[2nd]]

title: B
body:
<<emotion normal>> 
Ok, you are really not ok...
[[2nd]]

title: C
body:
<<emotion angry>> 
It was an accident, I’m trying to help you!!
<<lessmeter 10>>
[[2nd]]

title: 2nd
body:
<<emotion normal>> 
Sorry that I knocked you over, it's just that……. I wanted to explore the island. You don’t look like you belong here.
